biotools.summary:
A multi-level clustering scheme for population assignments based on core genome MLST.

HierCC (Hierarchical clustering of cgMLST).

HierCC is a multi-level clustering scheme for population assignments based on core genome Multi-Locus Sequence Types (cgMLSTs). HierCC has been implemented in EnteroBase since 2018.

bioschemas.name: HierCC
